title: Login Sceen doesn't show up.
body:
When I click on the LoL icon it opens up the client screen with the orange "launch" button and the screen had "The Client Update Has Begun."
And that's it from there. I click on "launch" and the login screen goes away and nothing else happens. I can't get the screen to login. Not sure what to do.

replies.body: This is most likely happening because your OS doesn't currently have the correct admin settings in place for that client update to process the game files. Give our [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) a go, and let me know if that doesn't help so I can dig a little deeper for you!
